text: Colobothea roppai is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Monné in 1993. It is known from Brazil.BioLib.cz - Colobothea roppai. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1993 Category:Beetles of South America
title: Colobothea roppai
